titleStmt.title: J. H. King et al. to Beriah Magoffin
CWG2851

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Beriah Magoffin: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Civil Appointments, 1859-1862

body.p:
To
-- His Excellency B. Magoffin Gov. Ky.
We the undersigned citizens of Hickman, & of Fulton County Ky. respect^fully^ recommend Dr. Charles Hubbard of Hickman to be appointed by your Excellency a Notary Public for ^the^ County of Fulton.

J. H. King
James. M. Linley
H. C. Ramage
J, L, Hubbard,
Z R Mcmahan
Wm Heron
Isaac Winston
Jos A Fowlkes
Dear Sir, I enclose you the above I could have gotten many more names and so far as I know all the were necessity, but thought it unnecessary. I should be obliged to you for this appointment

I am your Ex.ys Obet. Servt.
Charles Hubbard

Fulton Co.
Notary
Dr. C. Hubbard
Issd July 28. 1862
